original_text: it is so refreshing to see robin williams turn 180 degrees from the string of insultingly innocuous and sappy fiascoes he's been making for the last several years .
generated_text:
1. "It's a breath of fresh air to see Tom Hanks take on a role that showcases his dramatic range, a departure from his recent string of formulaic comedies."
2. "I was thrilled to see Julia Roberts return to her dramatic roots in this powerful performance, a departure from her recent rom-coms."
